steps.goal: Open sound settings using open_settings with setting 'sound'. Find and enable 'Do Not Disturb' mode. Set it to allow priority contacts only if the option is available.
Tap on your profile picture or the 'You' tab at the bottom. Tap on 'Set a status'. Set the emoji to the focus/headphones emoji and type 'In deep focus mode - back in 2 hours'. Tap Save or Done.
Search for 'lofi beats' and play the first playlist. Tap the shuffle or play button.
